LanguageData.DefleXitol_Effect.label: DefleXitol effect
LanguageData.DefleXitol_Effect.description: This creature is now under the effect of DeflXitol, so it takes less damage from all incoming attacks.
LanguageData.PyroForm_Effect.label: PyroForm effect
LanguageData.PyroForm_Effect.description: This creature is now under the effects of Pyroform, and therefore cannot catch fire and can tolerate extremely high temperatures.
LanguageData.MulE_Effect.label: Mul-E
LanguageData.MulE_Effect.description: This creature is now under the effect of Mul-E, so it can carry larger loads, but takes more damage from all incoming attacks.
LanguageData.Trasylol_500k_Effect.label: Trasylol 500k effect
LanguageData.Trasylol_500k_Effect.description: This creature is under the effects of Trasylol, and therefore hardly bleeds or feels any pain.
LanguageData.Regenostas_Effect.label: Regenostas effect
LanguageData.Regenostas_Effect.description: This creature is under the effects of Regenostas, so it cannot move, but it gains a huge boost to its natural regeneration.
LanguageData.Dofa_Effect.label: Dofa effect
LanguageData.Dofa_Effect.description: This creature is under the effect of Dofa, and therefore makes any job somewhat more efficient.
LanguageData.Flexitol_Effect.label: Flexitol effect
LanguageData.Flexitol_Effect.description: This creature is in a state of complete high, as well as more quickly assimilates any information.
